author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Well done that whale – I hope it also has the sense to stay away from boats with Japanese flags.

author: Irwin Bryan
content:
Hauser was interviewed on NPR yesterday. She said if it hadn’t happened to her and there weren’t 3 cameras recording she wouldn’t have believed it either. The people in the boat saw a second humpback in the area slapping it’s tail fin near the tiger shark while she was underwater.
Thanks for the story and video.
